messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Two rules you can do drugs and be nice to each other regardless of species

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone please infront of bridge I have something I want to share with you

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fine forget it I was gonna give you all a nice gift but forget it

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Clown wanted for vandalism

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ok you wanna attack people for racism from now on brig anyone being racist even eva if there attacking because of race

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Made a virus that turns you black if anybody want

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Oh crap, get the mop.

Meaty ores have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Made a virus that heals you in rads, come get if you want

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Instead if breaking into med, why don't you just ask me over the comms yeah?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Why do people keep breaking into medical? just fuckign ask me

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Space Station 13. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Suit sensors on max please

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Hey uh, somebody stole my mech

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Hey CMO here, somebody just threw a checmical bomb at me, we have a traitor k thanks

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: So uh, we have a virus, please analyze yourself and make your wya to virology, the symptoms are worsening

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Reports of traitorous actions commandeering the AI Controlled units on station have reached centcomm. We will be sending a team of people to deal with this emminently.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I want my pda and id back I dont even care you killed ian just return them and we are good

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Bring them to me at command

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: They have been returned thanks to casimir
